Title: God Eater Reso Nantoka Gekijou: Nagerareta Shokupan
Description: ['Short anime inspired by the iOS and Android mobile game ', God Eater Resonant Ops, '.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Introduces the characters through their first day of school. ', Resonant Ops, ' continues the story of ', God Eater 2 Rage Burst, ', which in turn is a sequel to ', God Eater Burst, ', and is set 4 years after the latter's story, moving the setting "at long last" toward the Fenrir Headquarters in the year 2078.']
Characters: ['der Vogelweid, Erina', 'Vita Lin Toe, Tiona', 'Kisaragi, Sera', 'Martin, Alek', 'Kamiki, Leo', 'Kamiki, Rio', 'Ogretail-kun']
Voices: ['Asumi, Kana', 'Uchida, Maaya', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Yamashita, Daiki', 'Shimono, Hiro', 'Oozora, Naomi', 'Nakai, Kazuya']
Staff: [['Shinohara, Parako', 'Director, Script, Storyboard, Series Composition'], ['Nagasaki, Yukio', 'Sound Director'], ['Asari, Fujiaki', 'Episode Director'], ['Tan, Ayako', 'Editing']]
